When getting a drink, a cup is ideal because it can be filled with any beverage of your choice. Whether it's water, juice, soda, coffee, tea, or even a smoothie, a cup can easily hold the beverage of your choice. It's also easy to keep track of, as you don't have to worry about bringing multiple glasses or mugs with you. 

The cups are also relatively inexpensive, which makes them a great option if you're on a budget. Additionally, the cups are easily disposable.
